Description:
Build your Dream Here
Located in the newly developed and sought after Shoalhaven Estate in Cowes, is this block of land of approximately 420 square metres due to be titled in May 2019. Just minutes to the stunning Cowes foreshore and a few minutes drive to the Cowes main shopping centre makes this the ideal location for your future permanent or holiday home. Start planning your dream home now!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Ideal Getaway
Every property has a feeling or emotion that is evoked when you enter, and with this double story property, it is one of serenity. It is light and bright, which seems so appropriate for a coastal residence.
Downstairs, the open plan kitchen and dining area opens out onto a southern front deck, perfect for the hot summer's day with protection from the afternoon sun. Also on the ground floor is a spacious master suite, complemented by a generously sized ensuite. A European laundry has been cleverly designed to sit tucked away under the stairwell.
Upstairs the second open plan living area, with adjoining 2 bedrooms, is serviced by a large family bathroom. The living area opens out onto a fantastic northerly facing sundeck, overlooking the rear garden and providing the perfect place to entertain.
There is ample accommodation for both cars and toys, in the large 6x9m double garage situated at the rear of the block. Set on 650sqm (approx), there is minimal maintenance required.
Within easy strolling distance to the beach, shops and all that Cowes has to offer - it would be suitable for holiday or permanent living.
This is a property that will surprise and delight with its great location and excellent presentation.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
Insights: 30 Koala Street, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
COTTAGE LIFESTYLE AT THE BEACH
This lovely house within Cowes is only walking distance to the main shopping precinct that has on offer many amazing retailers and food outlets. Schools and many other activities are only a short drive away.
Walking into the home you will be greeted by a spacious open plan kitchen, living & dining opening onto the wrap around deck, great to enjoy the mid to afternoon northern sun.
The home consists of 3 spacious bedrooms, a central bathroom and a separate toilet and laundry.
All this is set on a great sized allotment of approximately 585m2 and designed to be a low maintenance property, perfect for a holiday home.
This house can be purchased with all of the furniture if requested so be quick and call Alex Scott Cowes today on 5952 2633 to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
NO BODY CORPORATE!!
This rare opportunity to purchase this Holidays Stay/rental that could provide you an income or a new home next door to the ONLY HOSPITAL on Phillip Island! Catering for wheel chair access throughout the home! This central location is ideal as it is 50 meters from Coles and the main street of Cowes.
The New BUS DEPOT a few doors up will take you to all of Phillip Islands attractions and drop you home all times of the day and night right at your door step!
This Modern and stylish home is positioned walking distance to the north facing bay beach, sporting grounds, cafes and restaurants.
Designed across a single level, this spacious townhouse offers three bedrooms all with built in robes (Master with en-suite), two living areas, a fully equipped kitchen, central bathroom and laundry. The home features ducted vacuum system, slab heating and split system cooling. The property is fully fenced and includes a private rear courtyard and a single lock up garage.
Call Alex Scott Cowes today to arrange your private inspection 5952 2633

Description:
Remarkable relaxing retreat
Situated in a quiet area of Cowes this magnificent family home boasts three bedrooms, triple garage, beautiful landscaped low maintenance gardens, including water tank and in an ideal location walking distance to the Anderson boat ramp and child friendly beach.
The upstairs comprises of a spacious master bedroom or parents retreat with ensuite, walk in robe, reverse cycle air conditioner and a private deck. Downstairs includes an expansive open plan dining and kitchen, lower lounge with gas log fire, reverse cycle air conditioner and another two spacious bedrooms with an impressive central bathroom. Additional features of the property include two large outdoor deck areas perfect for entertaining, linen storage area, downstairs powder room and laundry with direct access out to the clothes line.
Whether youre looking for a permanent residence, holiday home or fantastic investment this home ticks all the boxes! Inspections are sure to impress!

Description:
Live the good life
Located within a private boutique gated complex this excellent home has the rare and desirable feature of being one of only two with direct access from your rear gate onto the shared heated pool.
Featuring three good sized bedrooms with built in robes, the master with ensuite and walk in robe. Two generous, light filled, open living areas with a choice of covered outdoor areas overlooking the pool and low maintenance gardens. Add to this a remote double garage, third toilet and well placed laundry. To complete the perfect lifestyle it also features a shared tennis court, putting green and barbeque area.
Suitable for holiday or permanent living it is close to town and only a short walk to the golf course, parks and beach. Inspection a must.

Description:
You little Beauty!
Offering huge potential is this single level home in a family friend pocket of Cowes.
Comprising a spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area, two robed bedrooms, bathroom and laundry area. There is also an undercover front deck as well as a full length verandah at the rear. With a host of additional features including combustion heating, split system heating and cooling, polished timber floors, solar power, electric cooking and insulated throughout.
All of this is set within a sizable 630 sqm approx. fully fenced allotment with established low maintenance surrounds and is within walking distance to the beach and Cowes boat ramp. Due to the size of the block there is also plenty of car/boat/caravan accommodation.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Spacious and Contemporary!
We all know that Phillip Island is now the place to be, so there are no doubts this home isn't one to miss! Guaranteed to surprise, this residence is positioned in one of Cowes most convenient locations and stunning Estates "Seagrove", a short drive to Cowes Main street with access to cafes, shops, bars and the stunning north facing beaches.
Featuring 3 generous bedrooms, an open plan kitchen, meals area with spacious adjoining rumpus room with built in home theatre system, fantastic for watching the latest game, or enjoying a family movie. The open plan living area leads out onto the north facing alfresco area. Making this home the perfect entertainer all year round. High ceilings and quality fittings makes this home a perfect home that will be suitable to all buyer demographics.
This property provides more than enough space and style inside and out including a double garage with internal access. With the added bonus of potential room down the side for a boat or caravan. Moving on to the yard, you will be impressed as the low maintenance design will enable you to spend more time relaxing and enjoying your life style.
Prepare to be impressed!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Premier Red Rocks Foreshore Opportunity - 2,371 m2 (approx)
Stunning foreshore position, a stunning block of land in a beautiful setting with lovely water views. This tightly held area was developed last century, in 1950, and this holding has been held in the same family since then. The family built a three bedroom beach cottage which has been much loved by three generations and is now offered for sale. The cottage has been built to take full advantage of the north with views to the water , it offers the opportunity to renovate or build a beautiful new home. This area has a covenant to allow one house on the block to retain the rural ambiance. The block has established trees and is very private with direct access to the beach. Single free standing garage and outhouse.
We seldom see such a beautiful land holding on Phillip Island offered for sale and you are invited to inspect by appointment or at an open for inspection.

Description:
Super Central Location
This fantastic two storey townhouse is located only 230 metres (approx.) from Cowes North facing bay beach and 400 metres (approx.) to Cowes main street and ALDI supermarket.
Downstairs features a spacious living area that opens onto an undercover outdoor patio, separate kitchen/ dining area with dishwasher, electric oven and cooktop, powder room and laundry.
Upstairs comprises of a spacious master bedroom with ensuite, spa, walk in robe, split system and access to an East facing balcony. There are a further two bedrooms both withbuilt in robes, separate bathroom with shower and bath and a small second living area at the top of the stairs, also with access to the balcony. Air conditioning is provided by a reverse cycle split system in the downstairs living & Kitchen area.
Other features include a double garage with remote door and a fully fenced, private front yard. This property would make an ideal investment property or holiday home. Call today to arrange an inspection.
Internal area
171m²

Description:
JUST LIKE NEW WALK TO THE BEACH AND SHOPS
This townhouse is located away from the other townhouses for peace and quiet and with it's own street frontage, it feels like a completely separate property. This 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom property presents a remarkable opportunity for its size, location and quality construction.
Entering via your private entrance you will see an open corridor that spans the height of the second level creating a grand staircase look. A generous lounge adjoins the dining area that leads out to a private courtyard with covered decking. The large hostess kitchen has ample room and a generous amount of storage including a pantry and a dishwasher. Downstairs also features the Master Bedroom with en-suite. Upstairs consists of 2 double bedrooms with built-in robes which are serviced by a central bathroom and another living area.
A great position close to transport, schools, parklands, bowling club, gym, medical centre, footy oval, tennis courts and beach.
Other features include:
-off street double garage w/remote
- separate laundry
-outside shower
-ducted heating
-porcelain tiles
-downlights

Description:
Dual Living In Perfect Location
Located just a few hundred meters from Anderson boat ramp and pristine north-facing beaches, this dual living gem is ideal for two families seeking a low maintenance holiday option or an astute investor looking to capitalise on an already popular holiday rental property with significant future potential.
Immaculately presented and designed to be ultra low maintenance, the property has been thoughtfully orientated to maximise the northern aspect and makes for a comfortable year round retreat.
Offering two fully self contained residences, each with two bedrooms, a central bathroom, toilet, laundry and a spacious kitchen with adjacent living and dining rooms. An elevated deck with retractable screen offers a perfect warm weather retreat and separate rear yards are great for those with pets.
Further complemented by an oversized garage with extra high clearance for those with a boat or caravan that is serviced by its own bathroom, and ample off street parking.
A property with such flexibility and potential is a rarity, and one in this premium location is unlikely to last long on the market. Call now and secure an inspection time.
The property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Palatial Home In prestigious estate
Situated on a 760sqm block, this spacious and modern four bedroom home oozes quality throughout! As you enter this family home through the large entrance hall, you will be impressed by its contemporary decor, space and classy appointments.
The open plan kitchen, living and dining area is complemented by a modern kitchen and walk in pantry with adjoining pool room that could be converted into a rumpus room, study or fifth bedroom. The neutral tones and tall ceilings give plenty of natural light throughout. There is easy access from here to the huge, outdoor covered alfresco area complete with built in barbeque and outdoor shower, overlooking the low maintenance, landscaped rear yard.
The spacious master bedroom features his and hers walk in robes, and ensuite with double vanities. A further three bedrooms all have built in robes and are serviced by a second family bathroom with separate toilet.
Boasting a 6 star energy rating with double glazed windows and fully insulated with ducted heating, solar hot water, 3000 litre water tank, recycled water system double lock up garage with access through to the backyard. The property is situated in the award winning Seagrove Estate, close to parklands, playgrounds and BBQ areas and only a short walk to Cowes shopping area and North facing bay beaches.
Call today to arrange an inspection.
Insights: 3 Rosella Grove, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Immaculate Seagrove Residence
Have you been considering looking for land to build your next home? This near new (3 years young) home takes all the stress out of building! This Porter Davis design - quality build Aspire home has been finished with exceptional detail and comes complete with landscaping, saving you time and money.
Situated on a large elevated 813sqm approx. block in the popular Seagrove Estate, this home is within walking distance to both the foreshore, and Thompson Avenue.
This 5 bedroom plus study home, offers over 29 squares of family living, with a practical and stylish floorplan. As you enter, you are greeted by a spacious entry, master suite with ensuite and walk in robe. The living area is designed with easy living in mind, with the main living area incorporating a contemporary kitchen with a host of features including a walk in pantry, stone bench tops, dishwasher, provisions for a plumbed fridge and 900mm appliances. An open dining space and family room is connected to the outdoor entertaining space via stacker doors.
Through to the kids wing, and you will find a second living/rumpus area - with their own bathroom, a further 3 bedrooms and separate laundry.
Outside the space has been exceptionally well designed to make the most of its location. Generous outdoor living, bordered by retaining walls and terraced garden. Backing onto farm land, you can enjoy views to the pasture and the resident cows, while having the convenience of estate living.
A levelled area at the rear, would provide the perfect location for the addition of an inground pool, with adjoining playground area for the kids.
A double garage with internal access, and additional parking at the side, would be ideal for the tradesman, or for additional family cars.
Other features include:-
Hydronic heating throughout
Ceiling fans
Bamboo Flooring
Quality NZ wool carpets
Exposed aggregate driveway, paths and paved areas
Double glazing to all windows
Instantaneous Gas Hot Water
Access to reticulated gas system available only in the Seagrove Estate.
Heated towel rails
Underfloor heating to ensuite
NBN
Ideal for either permanent living (being walking distance to local schools) or as an indulgent holiday home or investment property. Inspection is essential to experience the true quality and finishes for yourself.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Neat As A Pin And So Close To The Beach!
If its location you are after, then look no further!
In the sought after pocket of Red Rocks, positioned in a quiet leafy street - you will find this neat as a pin brick 4 bedroom home.
Located on a generous 652sqm block with single garage, and plenty of room for caravans, boat or cars, this low maintenance property would suit both permanent or holiday living.
The home has been well maintained, renovated and cared for by its current owners, and boasts a modern kitchen, 2 separate living areas, 4 bedrooms with three offering built in robes and an ensuite to the spacious master suite, separate laundry and family bathroom.
The home offers all the creature comforts including:-
Cozy slow combustion heater,
Split system heating and cooling
Ceiling fans
Stone benchtops
Glass splashback
Miele appliances
Practical timber vinyl plank flooring throughout
The living spaces extend outside with a large undercover decked entertaining area - perfect for summer barbeques.
With only a 500m approx. stroll to the white sandy north facing Red Rocks beach, and 3.6km approx. from Thompson Avenue, this Cowes property is ideally located for that coastal lifestyle that you have been waiting for.
Be sharp! Properties like this are not only rare, they are snapped up quickly!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Exclusive Home In An Enviable Location
Situated in an enviable quiet court location only metres to the popular and divine Lovers Walk' beach via a shared private walkway, is this finely built single level home exuding charm, comfort and privacy.
Entry to this beautifully presented home is by means of a paved pathway complimented by a lush garden where you will immediately feel a sense of peace and tranquility. Entering the home, the floor plan together with standout interior features such as warm cedar lined walls, makes the most of its beautiful north orientation. The main living area features a large and stylishly renovated kitchen boasting stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances and a walk in pantry. A sliding door from here transitions to a fabulous sunroom/outdoor entertaining area highlighted by expansive floor to ceiling glass sliding doors on either side and central to the sun drenched alfresco spaces, absolutely perfect for year round use.
Accommodation is located away from the main living area offering three/four robed bedrooms Including the master bedroom with an en-suite, a beautifully renovated family bathroom and combined laundry with under bench appliances and quality finishes.
Indulge in this amazing location knowing you have direct access along the walkway to the spectacular north facing white sandy safe beach just metres away.
This exclusive property in a location to match will endear the most knowing buyer.
With the shops, restaurants, cafes, football oval, tennis courts and other sporting facilities only steps away, you are sure to be impressed and feel comfortably at home!
Set on a surprisingly spacious 420 sqm approximately allotment, this immaculate property is ideal for either superb permanent living or as an incredible holiday retreat.
Adding to this wonderful property are inclusions such as a large single remote control garage, air conditioning, ceiling fans, dishwasher
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
BEAUTIFUL BEACH HOUSE CLOSE TO TOWN
This well-maintained home is located close to popular Red Rocks beach and only a short drive from Cowes, this location is perfection.
Entering the home, you will notice the stunning timber floors throughout the open plan kitchen, living & dining rooms. The ground floor also features two bedrooms, family bathroom and additional powder room plus an additional shower located in the laundry room, great for cleaning yourself off after visiting the beach.
.
The dining room opens on to the fantastic huge undercover alfresco perfect for enjoying a BBQ with friends and family.
Upstairs the home offers two additional bedrooms and a second full bathroom. All bedrooms and living spaces have split system heating and cooling and ceiling fans ideal for all year round comfort.
The home is also fitted with Solar Panels keeping your utility bills as low as possible and the wood fire downstairs keeps this home warm on those cold nights.
Located only a short stroll from the beautiful north facing Cowes beach, and minutes from the local cafes and restaurants, you will find this property is perfect for the investor or a great holiday home!
Call Alex Scott Cowes today on 56952 2633 to arrange your own private inspection or find out about our next open for inspection.

Description:
Boutique Townhouse with Water Views
This well positioned and appealing townhouse located in a boutique complex just 350 metres approx walk to the beautiful north facing Cowes bay beach will not last long! This excellent opportunity is also just minutes to the shops, cafes and restaurants and is ideally suited to those looking for a gorgeous low maintenance, coastal property whether you are an investor, holiday maker or looking for a quality permanent home.
This fabulous townhouse comprises two spacious levels with the lower level providing internal access to the home from the double garage, two spacious bedrooms including one with a sliding door to the garden, a family bathroom and laundry. Upstairs features amazing water views from the light filled kitchen, dining and living area with large sliding doors leading out to an expansive north facing private entertaining space. Also on this level is the oversized master bedroom with ensuite as well as a separate and convenient powder room for guests. Beautiful polished timber floor boards throughout the living space give the home a great beachside feel complemented by off white walls, white cabinetry and privacy and block out blinds.
In addition to the double remote garage, the property also boasts a large carport as well as a further paved and gated area which can be used to store a boat or caravan or to keep pets fenced in. The garage could also be used as a multipurpose/games room.
Other great features of this incredible home include split system heating and cooling, abundant storage cupboards in the garage, low maintenance gardens, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, water tank, communal barbecue, paved driveway
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
